title: Why is Lucifer so angry? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because Jesus won. Satan cannot have the soul of anyone who has put their faith in Jesus, so he must settle for taunting them. “ Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power. Put on the full armor of God, so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes. For our struggle is not against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the powers of this dark world and against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly realms.” Ephesians 6:10–12 Never take on the devil by yourself. Put on the Armor of God and declare the name of Jesus. “Resist the devil and he will flee.” Sincerely, Karen

Probably because he was proposing an improved management structure for Heaven, and for this he gets fired, with prejudice. You get good at your job, you try to help the boss make the place work better, and he tosses you out because he’s afraid you're trying to take over. Ungrateful bastard! Wouldn't you be pissed off? Just ’cause he's the boss, he thinks that makes him God?
